revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Roaring-Sea Caves |image = [[File:Roaring-Sea Caves.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Roaring-Sea Caves. |tokens = 1,730,000 |location = North of Giants Foot }} '''Roaring-Sea Caves''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 32,184,888 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | {{Pokemon|Zubat|40}} || rowspan=15 colspan=2|<center>N/A |- | {{Pokemon|Carbink|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Piloswine|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Deino|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Larvitar|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Riolu|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Audino|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Golbat|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Barboach|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Basculin (Red-Striped)|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Basculin (Blue-Striped)|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Magikarp|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Feebas|40}} |- | '''{{Pokemon|Omanyte|40}}*''' |- | '''{{Pokemon|Kabuto|40}}*''' |}
'''*Note:''' Omanyte and Kabuto will only appear if the player has captured them previously.
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | '''{{Pokemon|Kabutops|40}}*''' || rowspan=5|<center>160,924,440 || rowspan=5 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | '''{{Pokemon|Omastar|40}}*''' |- | {{Pokemon|Tyranitar|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Hydreigon|40}} |- | {{Pokemon|Lucario|40}} |}
'''*Note:''' Kabutops and Omastar will only appear if the player has captured them previously.
